name: Semi Auto Generated Stories
description:
WARNING:  If you download the game, the cursor changes when you hover over somethig you can click. For best experience please download it.

With this story generator you will be able to automatically generate stories... almost. The AI needs a little help from you. Click on objects to progress the story.

There are 8 endings and arguably even more.

For best experience download the game.

This game was made for the Wowie Jam 4.0.
